articles.title: India edges South Africa to win T20 Cricket World Cup - ESPN
articles.description: India pulled off a sensational seven-run win against South Africa in a gripping final of the Twenty20 World Cup, winning its first world title in 13 years.
articles.content:
Jun 30, 2024, 08:41 AM ET
BRIDGETOWN, Barbados -- India pulled off a sensational seven-run win against South Africa in a gripping final of the Twenty20 World Cup on Saturday.
